eventDecorators.name: AavePortalMintUnbacked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a router used Aave Portal liquidity for fast transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: transferId
parameterDecorators.description: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: router
parameterDecorators.description: - The authorized router that used Aave Portal liquidity.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: - The asset that was provided by Aave Portal.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of asset that was provided by Aave Portal.

eventDecorators.name: ExternalCalldataExecuted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a transfer has its external data executed.

parameterDecorators.name: transferId
parameterDecorators.description: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: success
parameterDecorators.description: - Whether calldata succeeded.

parameterDecorators.name: returnData
parameterDecorators.description: - Return bytes from the IXReceiver.

eventDecorators.name: RemoteAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new remote instance is added.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: - The domain the remote instance is on.

parameterDecorators.name: remote
parameterDecorators.description: - The address of the remote instance.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

eventDecorators.name: SequencerAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a sequencer is added or removed from whitelists.

parameterDecorators.name: sequencer
parameterDecorators.description: - The sequencer address to be added or removed.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

eventDecorators.name: SequencerRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a sequencer is added or removed from whitelists.

parameterDecorators.name: sequencer
parameterDecorators.description: - The sequencer address to be added or removed.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

eventDecorators.name: SlippageUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when `forceUpdateSlippage` is called by an user on the destination domain.

parameterDecorators.name: transferId
parameterDecorators.description: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: slippage
parameterDecorators.description: - The updated slippage boundary.

eventDecorators.name: TransferRelayerFeesIncreased
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when `_bumpTransfer` is called by an user on the origin domain both in `xcall` and `bumpTransfer`.

parameterDecorators.name: transferId
parameterDecorators.description: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: increase
parameterDecorators.description: - The additional amount fees increased by.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

functionDecorators.name: addSequencer
functionDecorators.description: Used to add an approved sequencer to the whitelist.

parameterDecorators.name: _sequencer
parameterDecorators.description: - The sequencer address to add.

functionDecorators.name: bumpTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Anyone can call this function on the origin domain to increase the relayer fee for a transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferId
parameterDecorators.description: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction.

functionDecorators.name: enrollRemoteRouter
functionDecorators.description: Register the address of a Router contract for the same xApp on a remote chain.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain of the remote xApp Router.

parameterDecorators.name: _router
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the remote xApp Router.

functionDecorators.name: forceUpdateSlippage
functionDecorators.description: Allows a user-specified account to update the slippage they are willing to take on destination transfers.

parameterDecorators.name: _params
parameterDecorators.description: TransferInfo associated with the transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _slippage
parameterDecorators.description: The updated slippage.

functionDecorators.name: removeSequencer
functionDecorators.description: Used to remove an approved sequencer from the whitelist.

parameterDecorators.name: _sequencer
parameterDecorators.description: - The sequencer address to remove.

functionDecorators.name: setXAppConnectionManager
functionDecorators.description: Modify the contract the xApp uses to validate Replica contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _xAppConnectionManager
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the xAppConnectionManager contract.
